I recruit only on W2 opportunities...it is very, VERY rare that I have a position where I can work on C2C.  It is so frustrating to constantly get email blasts containing "HOT LISTS" or "CURRENT BENCH CANDIDATES" when I have said to these companies multiple times I do not work on C2C and I have asked over and over again to be taken off their email lists.  Or more so, to post a job that says W2 candidates only and to STILL get calls and emails asking about C2C.  I wouldn't say W2 only if I didn't mean it!

Don't get me wrong, I do understand that some people are just doing their job and trying to employ their consultants, but I find it extremely unprofessional to spam recruiters and flood inboxes with endless emails.
Would love to hear other's thoughts!

As more companies and industries adopt the leading technology solutions, hardware and software are no longer a competitive advantage.  Its the people: our resources that guide how that software and hardware is designed, developed, deployed and managed.  Now for over 27 years PDS has built and refined one of the largest databases in the IT staffing industry.  We’ve placed literally thousands of resources successfully across our commercial, local-municipality and federal government clients.We have the ability to rapidly increase the capacity of our project teams by leveraging our local and national recruiting experience and expertise.  The teams and resources we assemble deliver a combination of experience and expertise in tools, technologies, and development methodologies necessary to support our clients’ vast needs and ensure successful project outcomes.We have industry-specific experience as well as with emerging technologies including Geo-spatial, Mobile and Cloud Computing.Our IT Staffing Services are focused around software applications from design and development to integration and support, for both custom and leading COTS applications.  Combining our passion for Technology solutions with twenty-seven years of successful delivery, we can confidently say there are very few environments, applications and/or tools, we haven’t seen or supported.

MDI Group helps IT organizations tackle “what’s next” in terms of emerging technology projects and challenging business objectives by providing a full range of information technology staffing services and contingent workforce solutions that supplement in-house resources. Services range from contract and contract-to-hire placements to project teams and end-to-end processes that maximize the engagement and management of contract labor. MDI Group’s IT Workforce Solutions are based on a distinctive combination of comprehensive IT specialization, collaborative service delivery model, local market expertise and “best fit” resources.For more than 25 years, MDI has delivered successful solutions by first seeking a thorough understanding of our clients, including their culture, processes and strategic goals. We then draw upon the broad technical knowledge base of our team members and the well-established connections in local markets we serve to provide the best solutions possible.

VincentBenjamin knows technology and the talent resources needed to make your organization a winning one. Not only do we stay on top of a carefully managed network of A-level technology candidates and consultants, we also stay on top of the trends that shape the technology requirements in today's complex business environment. Trends like cloud computing, mobile enterprise technology, and increased IT security.From programmers to project managers, from project support to full time placements, VincentBenjamin has the technology resources you need to not only fill an opening, but to build your business.

Insight Global is a premier technology staffing services firm, ranked as one of the top 5 fastest growing staffing firms for 6 consecutive years and named the 4th largest IT staffing firm in America. Since our inception in 2001, we have experienced unprecedented growth within our industry. We have rapidly expanded from an Atlanta based start-up to one of the most successful IT staffing firms in America, with 34 offices nationwide and counting. Insight Global employs over 18,000 people each year in companies nationwide and currently boasts revenues over $900 Million. We plan to continue this growth trend by expanding to 50 offices nationwide, entering into industries such as Finance/Accounting, Administrative and Healthcare staffing, and ultimately going international. Insight Global strives for the fastest response times to inbound job requisitions, and we focus on building relationships with both clients and consultants. Our candidates are the cornerstone of our business. Our goal is to present you with a perfect employment opportunity for your skillset while exhibiting our core values of honesty, integrity and a commitment to ethical business practices. Our highly trained Technical Recruiters will take the time to evaluate both your credentials and career aspirations to identify the right job for you. This formula leads to both client and consultant satisfaction and industry-leading placement times. 2014- 4th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2013 - 6th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm 2012 - 8th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 20th Largest Staffing Firm 2011 - “One of America’s Top 10 Job Producers” 2011 - #5 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2010 - #2 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2009 - #4 Fastest Growing & 14th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2008 - #4 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm 2007 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm 2006 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm

Justice studies is an innovative social science program examining current social justice issues, such as human rights, domestic violence and immigration, against a backdrop of legal systems, law and culture. The BS degree program equips students with a dynamic knowledge of the world's justice systems and gives them the skills to create meaningful, real-world change emphasizing quantitative skills. Students learn about statistics and research methods to understand social justice issues in diverse settings.

Evan is a very sharp, personable recruiter with a drive to perform above the "norm." He took a real interest in my background and searched diligently in finding the right fit for me. He leveraged relationships with coworkers and other associates in order to expand the opportunities that could be offered to me (my skill set allows me to jump between multiple roles); something that most other recruiters would not do in order to hog a commission. I would have no hesitation in recommending Evan to friends or family who were looking for a career change or new professional challenge.
